original_text: Some people in the crowd shouted one thing and other people shouted something different. There was so much noise that the leader of the soldiers was not sure about the true facts. He did not know what had really happened. So he said to his soldiers, ‘Take this man up into our strong building!’
korean_text: 무리 가운데서 어떤 이는 이런 말로, 어떤 이는 저런 말로 소리 치거늘 천부장이 소동으로 말미암아 진상을 알 수 없어 그를 영내로 데려가라 명하니라

sentences.original_text: Some people in the crowd shouted one thing
sentences.korean_translation: 군중 속의 어떤 사람들은 한 가지를 외쳤다

sentences.original_text: and other people shouted something different
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 사람들은 다른 것을 외쳤다

sentences.original_text: that the leader of the soldiers was not sure
So he said to his soldiers
